title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled, but they do not have any effect when moved.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect on the image.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled so that they do not mislead users into thinking they can scroll the image.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved but have no effect on the image, even when opening a small image like an icon.
